## Matrix4.getRow() method

Retrieves a copy of the matrix row at the provided index as a Cartesian4 instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getRow(matrix: Matrix4, index: number, result?: Cartesian4): Cartesian4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | The matrix to use. |
|  index | number | The zero-based index of the row to retrieve. |
|  result | [Cartesian4](./toygl.cartesian4.md) | _(Optional)_ The object onto which to store the result. |

**Returns:**

[Cartesian4](./toygl.cartesian4.md)

The modified result parameter.

## Exceptions

[DeveloperError](./toygl.developererror.md) index must be 0, 1, 2, or 3.
